statements: SELECT * FROM campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, budget FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 101;
SELECT campaign_name, target_audience FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 1000 ORDER BY end_date DESC, start_date ASC
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE target_audience = 'Young Adults'
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM campaigns WHERE target_audience LIKE '%Women%' ORDER BY budget DESC
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE end_date > start_date AND budget BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY campaign_id
SELECT * FROM campaign_performance_metrics;
SELECT clicks, impressions FROM campaign_performance_metrics;
SELECT customer_id, email_opens, website_visits FROM customer_engagement_metrics;
SELECT DISTINCT campaign_id FROM campaign_performance_metrics;
SELECT SUM(conversions) FROM campaign_performance_metrics;
SELECT * FROM campaign_performance_metrics WHERE impressions > 100 AND clicks > 50
SELECT campaign_id, impressions, conversions FROM campaign_performance_metrics ORDER BY impressions DESC, conversions ASC
SELECT customer_id, email_opens, website_visits FROM customer_engagement_metrics WHERE website_visits > 500 ORDER BY email_opens DESC
SELECT campaign_id, impressions, clicks, conversions FROM campaign_performance_metrics WHERE conversions > 10
SELECT customer_id, email_clicks, website_visits FROM customer_engagement_metrics WHERE email_clicks > 20 ORDER BY email_clicks DESC
SELECT * FROM campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM campaigns;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT id, campaign_name FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01' AND end_date < '2021-12-31'
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY budget DESC
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_name LIKE 'Summer Campaign%' AND budget BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000
SELECT id, campaign_name FROM campaigns WHERE start_date < '2021-06-30' AND end_date > '2021-09-30' ORDER BY start_date ASC
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2021-10-01' AND end_date <= '2021-12-31'
SELECT * FROM campaigns;
SELECT id, name, budget FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, name, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT SUM(budget) AS total_budget FROM campaigns;
SELECT customer_id, engagement_type, timestamp FROM customer_engagement WHERE engagement_type = 'email' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT name, budget FROM campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT id, SUM(conversions) AS total_conversions FROM campaign_performance GROUP BY id HAVING total_conversions > 100;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(lifetime_value) AS max_lifetime_value FROM customer_metrics GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY max_lifetime_value DESC;
SELECT engagement_type, COUNT(*) AS engagement_count FROM customer_engagement WHERE timestamp > '2022-07-01' GROUP BY engagement_type ORDER BY engagement_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT engagement_type, engagement_value FROM engagements WHERE engagement_id = 1001;
SELECT campaign_id, impressions, clicks, conversions FROM campaigns_performance WHERE performance_id = 500;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE start_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY campaign_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT engagement_type, engagement_value FROM engagements WHERE engagement_date > '2022-06-30' ORDER BY engagement_value DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, clicks, conversions FROM campaigns_performance WHERE impressions > 1000 ORDER BY campaign_id ASC, clicks DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaign_results WHERE result_description LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY result_date DESC;
